##Geometry Parameters##.xmin: Minimum X coordinate for the domain (m)
##Geometry Parameters##.xmax: Maximum X coordinate for the domain (m)
##Geometry Parameters##.ymin: Minimum Y coordinate for the domain (m)
##Geometry Parameters##.ymax: Maximum Y coordinate for the domain (m)
##Geometry Parameters##.zmin: Minimum Z coordinate for the domain (m)
##Geometry Parameters##.zmax: Maximum Z coordinate for the domain (m)

##Continuum Damage-Breakage Model Parame.xi_0: Strain invariant ratio at onset of damage ξ_0
##Continuum Damage-Breakage Model Parame.xi_d: Strain invariant ratio at onset of breakage ξ_d
##Continuum Damage-Breakage Model Parame.CdCb_multiplier: Breakage accumulation rate multiplier Cm (C_B (1/s) = Cm * C_d)
##Continuum Damage-Breakage Model Parame.C_g: Compliance of fluidity of the fine grain material C_g (1/(Pa s))
##Continuum Damage-Breakage Model Parame.m1: Coefficient of power law index m_1
##Continuum Damage-Breakage Model Parame.m2: Coefficient of power law index m_2
##Continuum Damage-Breakage Model Parame.chi: Ratio of two energy states χ

##Initial Damage Parameters##.len_fault_strike: Length of initial damage strip along strike direction (m)
##Initial Damage Parameters##.len_fault_dip: Length of initial damage strip along dip direction (m)
##Initial Damage Parameters##.len_fault_normal: Length of initial damage strip along normal direction (m)
##Initial Damage Parameters##.nucl_distance: Length of nucleation patch along strike/dip direction (m)
##Initial Damage Parameters##.nucl_thickness: Length of nucleation patch along normal direction (m)
##Initial Damage Parameters##.e_sigma: Value of initial damage exponential decay

##Boundary Condition##.normal_traction_x: Normal boundary traction along x direction (Pa)
##Boundary Condition##.normal_traction_z: Normal boundary traction along z direction (Pa)
##Boundary Condition##.normal_traction_y: Normal boundary traction along y direction (Pa)
##Boundary Condition##.shear_traction: Shear boundary traction along x-z direction (Pa)
